content: कल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कल्-घञ्] {@--1@} Sweet and indistinct (अस्पष्टमधुर); कर्णे कलं किमपि रौति <ls>H. 1. 81</ls>; सारसैः कलनिर्ह्रादैः <ls>R. 1. 41</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 59</ls>; <ls>M. 5. 1.</ls> (Hence) {@--2@} Low, soft, sweet (note &c.); melodious, pleasing. {@--3@} Making noise, jingling, tinkling &c.; भास्वत्कलनूपुराणां <ls>R. 16. 12</ls>; कलकिंकिणीरवं <ls>Śi. 9. 74</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">82</ls>; कलमेखलाकलकलः <ls n="Śi.">6. 14</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">4. 57</ls>. {@--4@} Weak. {@--5@} Crude; undigested. --लः {@--1@} A low or soft and inarticulate tone. {@--2@} (In poetry) Time equal to four Mātrās. {@--3@} ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>pl.</ab>%}) A class of manes. --लं Semen.
